description:
We'll have the inside track on some of your favourite games, including Warhammer 40,000, Warhammer Age of Sigmar, Warhammer: The Old World, Warhammer: The Horus Heresy, and more! See how to tune in: https://ow.ly/2ibn50T0Y0W

title: Coming Soon: The Warhammer Preview Show – NOVA Open 2024

description:
The Vespid Stingwings are recruited from plenty of different Strains – such as the notoriously ferocious Firewing Strain, with their vivid orange-and-black exoskeletons. In this painting guide, Ollie will show you how to paint your very own Vespid Stingwing Strain Leader in a quick and easy way that looks awesome! You’ll be able to get your kill team ready for the gaming table in no time!

Base:
Khorne Red
Mechanicus Standard Grey
Runelord Brass
Wraith Bone

Layer:
Fire Dragon Bright
Gorthor Brown
Sons of Horus Green
Ushabti Bone
White Scar

Contrast:
Black Legion
Flesh Tearers Red
Frostheart
Gryph-hound Orange
Striking Scorpion Green

Shade:
Fuegan Orange
Nuln Oil

Technical:
Lahmian Medium
Contrast Medium

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/warhammer
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
-
title: How To Paint: Vespid Stingwing Strain Leader | Intermediate | Warhammer 40,000
